fields.summary: [Java][ORC] Move JNI build configuration from cpp/ to java/

comments.body:
Before to initiate activities to migrate JNI ORC is needed to validate if Adapter ORC could be cover by new Dataset ORC support

 

[~kou]
OK. If Dataset ORC is enough, we can drop Adapter ORC, right?
